system.descriptor: Resisting the effects of Alcohol and Narcotics. Failiure results in gaining Fatigue or some other side effect.
system.uses: Skill Test taken on Imbibing or suffering effects of Alcohol/Narcotics, Success resists effects, Failiure Succumbs to them. Repeated failiure made lead to Loss of Conciousness for 1d10-Toughness Bonus hours (minimum 1)

description.value: Resisting the effects of Alcohol and Narcotics. Failiure results in gaining Fatigue or some other side effect.
